sentences.en: Although it was a great hobby for her, she wanted to study aeronautics or astronomy as a career.
sentences.cn: 不过这只是她一大爱好，她本想学习航空或天文作为职业。

sentences.en: Apollos and Drones retain booster light when upgraded with Advanced Aeronautics atCarrier.

sentences.en: Beryllium has been widely used in aeronautics and astronautics, electron industry and national defense industry.
sentences.cn: 铍及铍合金在航空航天 、 电子工业和国防工业等方面应用十分广泛.

sentences.en: Ceramic matrix textile composite has been widely used as components in hot end of aeronautics astronautics.

sentences.en: Evolvable Hardware has high value and huge potential use in electronic systems of Aeronautics and Astronautics.
sentences.cn: 进化硬件在航空航天电子系统中有巨大的应用价值和潜力.

sentences.en: Finally, the Civil Aeronautics Board ( CAB ) has jurisdiction over civil aviation, including routes, rates, and sudsidies.
sentences.cn: 最后, 民用航空局 ( CAB ) 对民航(包括航线, 运费和津贴)有管辖权.

sentences.en: If we in fact had the right level of investment in aeronautics, we would not currently be competing with Airbus.
sentences.cn: 如果我们真的在航空领域投入了足够多的资金，现在就绝不会还在与空中客车缠斗了。
